title: Is Hadith regarding Sayyidul Istighfar Authentic? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: naveed from naveed malik says is the hadith regarding said far authentic the answer is yes say idr stir far is one of the most authentic hadiths and one of the great hadiths that we recite in the morning at car in the evening at car whenever someone does a sin this is a great hadith and it is surely authentic
